DisplayText.Title: Zombie Carmine
DisplayText.Body:
The Carmine Brothers are back... from the dead! Collect these Zombie variants now and enjoy ""BRAAAAINS"" while they last - in our next update, all Zombies Characters will have their normal character dialogue!

Anthony Carmine rises with his brutal headshot injury at the hands of a Locust Sniper. The plucky Benjamin Carmine returns complete with his missing lower torso inners - an injury that can be seen from the front and the rear!

CHARACTERS
Zombie Ben Carmine
Zombie Anthony Carmine
Zombie Gary Carmine

WEAPON SKINS
Zombie Carmine

EMBLEMS
Zombie Carmine

Items.Name: ZombieCarminePack
Items.Description: It Runs In The Family! Chance at Zombie Anthony, Benjamin or Gary Carmine characters, as well as Zombie Carmine themed weapon skins.

Packs.Name: ZombieCarminePack
Packs.Description: It Runs In The Family! Chance at Zombie Anthony, Benjamin or Gary Carmine characters, as well as Zombie Carmine themed weapon skins.
